entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -28.0°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
